remarks: Less-than and covers equivalence in a Hilbert lattice.  ( ~ chcv2 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cvr2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvr2.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
cvr2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cvr2.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvr2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cvr2N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) -> ( X .< ( X .\/ P ) <-> X C ( X .\/ P ) ) ) $.
